'''Beta 1.5_02''' is a [[server]]-only version of [[Java Edition Beta]] released on April 20, 2011,<ref>{{tweet|notch|60693553113874432|Minecraft server beta 1.5_02 is out. A last minute tweak caused the biiig bug in 1.5_01, sorry.|20 Apr 2011}}</ref> to fix a few issues with [[Beta 1.5_01]]. Beta 1.5_01 clients can connect to servers running Beta 1.5_02.<ref>{{tweet|notch|60701711488122881|The minecraft client is still _01. There was no client changes, so I didn't update it.|20 Apr 2011}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* The game no longer crashes from "internal server error" created by bugs in [[Beta 1.5_01]] server in [[multiplayer]].
* The "Saving Chunks" screen is no longer shown when taking an item out of a [[crafting table]].
